00018     $test = array
00019     (
00020         "g:h"           =>  "g:h",

00022         "./g"           =>  "http://a/b/c/g",
00023         "g/"            =>  "http://a/b/c/g/",

00027         "#s"            =>  "http://a/b/c/d;p?q#s",

00033         ""              =>  "http://a/b/c/d;p?q",
00034         "."             =>  "http://a/b/c/",
00035         "./"            =>  "http://a/b/c/",

00037         "../"           =>  "http://a/b/",

00051         "./g/."         =>  "http://a/b/c/g/",
